title: League client is broken again.
body:
Title. I fixed the problem, and the game worked fine for the week. I tried to open league today and the icon on my toolbar lights up for about 8 seconds, like anything else that's on your toolbar, and then nothing happens. I opened task manager, and while the icon is glowing, it shows up in processes.
I tried running as admin, same thing happened.

EDIT: Anyone with a similar problem try this:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.82\deploy

Use the LoLPatcher.exe

replies.body: A setting might have changed that's not allowing the launcher to open anymore, but it could have also crashed in the background.  A solid PC restart could help resolve this!  Otherwise, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that any changes with updates or settings is allowing the client to launch.
Are you launching the Legacy or Beta client?

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xiFsqegN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-29T06:03:51.414+0000)
>
> Are you launching the Legacy or Beta client?

I'm using the LeagueClient.exe.
The one with the new icon.
